name: NSSpellChecker.OptionKey
desc: The constants are optional keys that can be used in the options dictionary parameter of the check(_:range:types:options:inSpellDocumentWithTag:orthography:wordCount:), requestChecking(of:range:types:options:inSpellDocumentWithTag:completionHandler:), and menu(for:string:options:atLocation:in:) methods.

items.name: static let documentAuthor: NSSpellChecker.OptionKey
items.desc: An NSString containing the name of an author to be associated with the document

items.name: static let documentTitle: NSSpellChecker.OptionKey
items.desc: An NSString containing the title to be associated with the document.

items.name: static let documentURL: NSSpellChecker.OptionKey
items.desc: An NSURL to be associated with the document.

items.name: static let orthography: NSSpellChecker.OptionKey
items.desc: An NSOrthography instance indicating an orthography to be used as a starting point for orthography checking, or as the orthography if orthography checking is not enabled.

items.name: static let quotes: NSSpellChecker.OptionKey
items.desc: An NSArray containing four strings to be used with quote (opening double quote, closing double quote, opening single quote, and closing single quote in that order); if not specified, values will be taken from user's preferences.

items.name: static let referenceDate: NSSpellChecker.OptionKey
items.desc: An NSDate to be associated with the document, used as a referent for relative dates; if not specified, the current date will be used.

items.name: static let referenceTimeZone: NSSpellChecker.OptionKey
items.desc: An NSTimeZone to be associated with the document, used as a reference for dates without time zones; if not specified, the current time zone will be used.

items.name: static let replacements: NSSpellChecker.OptionKey
items.desc: An NSDictionary containing replacements to be used with NSTextCheckingTypeReplacement; if not specified, values will be taken from user's preferences.
